channel.title: CVE Feed for Sciener -- Kontrol Lux
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Sciener -- Kontrol Lux

item.title: CVE-2023-7003|2024-09-24T14:42:55.921Z -- sciener -- kontrol%20lux
item.description: The AES key utilized in the pairing process between a lock using Sciener firmware and a wireless keypad is not unique, and can be reused to compromise other locks using the Sciener firmware.
